hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Apple Watch (1 per team member — max 5)

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=370 King St W, Toronto, ON M5V 1J9, Canada

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Is it something net new, or a copy of something else?
How well does it integrate Watson’s capabilities?
How elegantly does it solve the problem?
How well did the product meet its own objectives?
How well did the team present?

hackathon-location-address: 370 King St W, Toronto, ON M5V 1J9, Canada
hackathon-description-header: Create new technology experiences using conversational interfaces and the IBM Watson IoT Platform.
